preqs: Students must have passed AFF2401, BFF2401, BFW2401 or AFW2401 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {AFF3651%, AFW3651, BFF3651, DEB365, DEB3651%, FIN365, FIN3651}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {AFF2401, AFW2401, BFF2401, BFW2401} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: The role of treasury, coordination and management of the treasury operation, quantitative and qualitative risk analysis, risk management process and hedging techniques, role and mechanics of derivative products, performance measurement and evaluation.
